name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Modern + Inner Basic Tiles
detailed_description:
Update your home furnishings and build super-chic and trendy interiors with Modern+ Interior Basic. This pack contains lots of interesting must-have tiles from inside modern city buildings, focusing on residential constructions and home furnishings. Become your own interior designer and decorate your home with style! Lots of variations of many tiles including TVs, bench, stove, sink, bookshelves, aquarium, computer and many more!

Features:

* Tile A4 / A5 (floor, walls etc.)
* Graphic Tile to create a Bathroom: (sink, tub with water, tub without water, shower, toilet, washing machine, shampoo, towel hanger and more!)
* Graphic Tile to create a Kitchen: (kitchen furniture, refrigerator, oven, windows and more!)
* Graphic Tile to create a Living Room: (fishing tank, furniture, desk, bookshelf, lamp, TV, rug and more!)
* Graphic Tile to create a Bedroom and beyond: (various bed, side table, windows, grand piano, fan and more!)
* Animation: (Front-load washer, TV screen / 4 kinds, water from tub, shower, fan, bathtub water)
* Othes: Food items and kitchen items!
* For use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
